parameters.prompt: I need to rename the Flutter app at apps/lucid_home/ to openscheme. Please thoroughly explore and identify ALL places that reference 'lucid_home'...
Execute the directory and file rename operations for renaming lucid_home to openscheme...
Update Android configuration for renaming lucid_home to openscheme...
Update iOS configuration for renaming lucid_home to openscheme...
Update all Dart source files to replace lucid_home with openscheme...
Update IDE configuration files for renaming lucid_home to openscheme...

pattern.context_summary: Large-scale Flutter app rename operation using parallel Task delegation - Explore first to understand scope, then parallel specialized agents for Android, iOS, Dart code, and IDE config
pattern.interpretation: Exemplary Strategic Abstraction pattern: Human specifies intent (rename app), Claude orchestrates parallel specialized agents. Demonstrates proper use of impl-flutter agents for platform concerns.
